TextENG: July 1, 1982
To departments 1 through 12,
Chief of the Prefectural Police headquarters.
July 1, 1982

TextJPN: 各警察署長・施設管理者殿
TextENG: To the chief constable and all facility managers.

TextJPN: 雛見沢村における事件について（通達）
TextENG: Regarding cases situated in the Hinamizawa village. (Notice)

TextJPN: 鹿骨市雛見沢村の近年の事件は、すでに一部マスコミでも報道されるように、
TextENG: As cases in Shishibone city, Hinamizawa village have been reported by certain sections of mass media,

TextJPN: 世間の好奇の目を引き地域住民の穏便な生活に重大な影響を及ぼしつつある、大変憂慮すべき事態となっている。
TextENG: it has drawn global attention, which is causing serious repercussions for the local residents. This has become a very serious situation.

TextJPN: 地域住民の生活と財産を保護するため、以下の遵守を通達する。
TextENG: To protect the livelihood and prosperity of the residents, the following notice has been issued.
1. Designate the following criminal investigations as classified.
Okinomiya station 1982 case number 168:

TextJPN: 雛見沢村主婦殺人事件（６月２３日発生）
TextENG: Hinamizawa village housewife murder (Dated June 23th)
Okinomiya station 1982 case number 171:

TextJPN: 雛見沢村生徒失踪事件（６月２４日発生）
TextENG: Hinamizawa village student disappearance (Dated June 24th)
2. Non-disclosure of information.
Okinomiya station 1979 case number 91:

TextJPN: 雛見沢村現場監督殺人事件（６月２２日発生）
TextENG: Hinamizawa village site foreman murder (Dated June 22th)
Shira station 1980 case number 103:

TextJPN: 白川自然公園転落事故（６月２３日発生）
TextENG: Shirakawa natural park falling incident (Dated June 23th)
Okinomiya station 1981 case number 118:

TextJPN: 雛見沢村神主妻失踪事件（６月２３日発生）
TextENG: Hinamizawa village Shinto priest's wife's disappearance (Dated June 23th)

TextJPN: （３）関係各機関への報道自粛要請
TextENG: 3. Requesting self-restraint from each organization concerning the release of sensitive information.
Please see attached reference materials 1, 2, and 3.

TextJPN: 担当警察署は別紙参照
TextENG: See the attached sheet for the police station in charge.
Police Department Hoshina ・ Nagaoka
